verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Our Father who art in Heaven, Hallowed be Thy name.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Thy kingdom come, Thy will be done, On earth as it is in heaven.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Give us this day our daily bread; And forgive us our trespasses

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: As we forgive those Who trespass against us.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: And lead us not into temptation, But deliver from evil.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: For the kingdom, the power and the glory are yours now and forever. Amen.
